segments.text: This scene in the kitchen draws me in with its details.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces left, polishing her dishware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The towel bunches up around the plate's edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water running from the tap unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The basin fills and spills over the rim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It streams down the cabinet fronts steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot dips into the accumulating water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above frames a tidy outdoor garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Low bushes flank a walkway in the sunlight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, the cabinet doors hang open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy stands tall on the wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching deep into the cookie-filled jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A plate in his other hand balances precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready, palm up for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their adventure seems fun but risky.
segments.speaker: PAR
